mapper.insert: insert into qjsq(qjyy, qjms, ksTime, jsTime, qjzt, userId) values(#{qjyy},#{qjms},#{ksTime},#{jsTime},'审批中',#{userId})
mapper.select:
select userId,ksTime,qjzt,qjyy,qjms,jsTime from qjsq where 1=1
and qjId=#{qjId}
mapper.update: update set qjzt=#{qjzt} from qjsq where userId=#{userId}
